description: a spiced almond milk served during the festival of Holi.  Creamy and refreshing, it is vegan and gluten free.
keywords: almond drink, traditional Indian drink, yogurt drink
name: Thandai (Spiced Almond Milk) and Thandai Lassi (Yogurt Drink). vegan glutenfree
recipeIngredient: 1/8 tsp cardamom powder or 1 green cardamom
1/4 cup raw cashews as fine as possible.
Garnish with chopped pistachios and a few saffron strands

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, add the ground cashew and spice mix, add 1/2 cup Almond milk and blend well until smooth.
Add about 1 cup more almond milk and raw sugar as needed (1.5-2 Tablespoons raw sugar or maple or dates). Blend and chill for at least an hour, to let the spices infuse in the drink.
Give it a mix before serving. Garnish with chopped pistachios and a few saffron strands.
If you have rose water or pistachio essence, add some to taste.
